message.name: ERR_PRODUCT_FV_ACTIVE_PRODUCTPROVISION
message.locale: Product cannot be canceled until product provision associated with a product is canceled.
Product cannot be cancelled until product provision associated with a product is cancelled.

message.name: ERR_FV_PRODUCT_ADDCATEGORY_STATUS
message.locale: You cannot add categories to this product as it has been canceled
You cannot add categories to this product as it has been cancelled

message.name: ERR_FV_PRODUCT_REMOVECATEGORY_STATUS
message.locale: You cannot remove categories from this product as it has been canceled
You cannot remove categories from this product as it has been cancelled
